Entries.6_2: A tasteless TV dinner tonight, or something I can't afford from the saloon? Choices, choices....
Entries.18_2: Gus gets up at dawn to bake bread for the Saloon. Then he's up until late bartending. I wish had even half of that man's energy and dedication.
Entries.22_2: I wish I could have been a better mother for Penny.$s
Entries.26_2: Penny thinks I should take up playing chess or something. Find something to occupy me.

Entries.24_2: Hmmm....boxed red wine or boxed white wine for tonight?
